HeroStoryUI.AreaSelect_FoundNewArea:
[Npc:Icon chara="HeroOlimar"/][UE:Meta key="67263bcea89e4f9981e8dcedf941a5de" Scale="1"/]The S.S. Dolphin can now travel further
afield. I should look for parts in that
unexplored region.
HeroStoryUI.AreaSelect_FoundNewArea_Area010:
[Npc:Icon chara="HeroOlimar"/][UE:Meta key="77630f30e6204a71a741b90ab7dbec8d" Scale="1"/]The rest of the parts should be in this
structure. Once I find them all, I can
escape this planet!
HeroStoryUI.AreaSelect_StillPartsLeft:
[Npc:Icon chara="HeroOlimar"/][UE:Meta key="235fda7be08f47e988c9d9df06e60766" Scale="1"/]There are a few places around here that I
still need to check out. Perhaps I should keep
exploring the area for a bit longer.
HeroStoryUI.AreaSelect_StillOnyonLeft:
[Npc:Icon chara="HeroOlimar"/][UE:Meta key="d93a0f50fea6445bb16668229fa32052" Scale="1"/]I'm sure I've found all the ship parts around
here, but I have a feeling there's more to
uncover. Perhaps an Onion or something?
HeroStoryUI.AreaSelect_Completed:
[Npc:Icon chara="HeroOlimar"/][UE:Meta key="bb8bbd98d7bd497a80c0113616e7c016" Scale="1"/]I've seen all there is to see here. I believe it's
time I focused my energy on finding the rest
of the parts in another area.
HeroStoryUI.AreaSelect_LastDayArea123:
[Npc:Icon chara="HeroOlimar"/][UE:Meta key="11836406887844ef865db8ef348e66fe" Scale="1"/]I must find all the remaining ship parts and
take off before the day's over. No time for
dawdling, I fear.
HeroStoryUI.AreaSelect_LastDayArea10:
[Npc:Icon chara="HeroOlimar"/][UE:Meta key="6cf988467e9743a1ae6ba4f31a877e8b" Scale="1"/]I only have [System:Color name="Warning" ]1 day left[System:Color name="Default"]... It feels like I'm pinning
all my hopes on what happens here today.
I need to find the remaining parts!
HeroStoryUI.MessageType01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="039fc512a0454551b9db0fad153b0c55" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad" lipsync="0"/]Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it's all come down to this.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Tomorrow
my life-support system will fail.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="039fc512a0454551b9db0fad153b0c55" Scale="1"/]Is it possible?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Will I be able to collect all
the remaining ship parts in [System:Color name="Warning" ]1 day[System:Color name="Default"]?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="039fc512a0454551b9db0fad153b0c55" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command" lipsync="0"/]The only thing I know for sure is that I
can't give up![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I still have one last day, and
I will keep searching until the very end.
HeroStoryUI.MessageType01_2:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="680b117073ec4c89a739c45ec9759470" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad" lipsync="0"/]Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it's all come down to this.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] [System:Color name="Warning" ]Tomorrow[System:Color name="Default"]
my life-support system will fail.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="680b117073ec4c89a739c45ec9759470" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad" lipsync="0"/]Thankfully,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] a fully repaired S.S. Dolphin is
in reach.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] If I stay calm and keep collecting
parts, I may be able to escape this planet!
HeroStoryUI.MessageType02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="0ef13de19850408f9b642b178dd23b31" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk" lipsync="0"/]Today I made a new friendâ€”[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0ef13de19850408f9b642b178dd23b31" Scale="1"/]I've never encountered this strange breed
of dog,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but we quickly bonded.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] At this very
moment, she's asleep by my side.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0ef13de19850408f9b642b178dd23b31" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad" lipsync="0"/]It's comforting to have [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] and the
Pikmin with me...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] With their help,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] my
search for ship parts is sure to go well.
HeroStoryUI.MessageType03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="6d3f1e670d034b289412bfed85415e17" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad" lipsync="0"/]Hurrah![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I collected my first ship part![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6d3f1e670d034b289412bfed85415e17" Scale="1"/]If I keep finding them at this rate,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I won't
have any trouble escaping this planet![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6d3f1e670d034b289412bfed85415e17" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think" lipsync="0"/]With that in mind,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I can't risk wasting even
a single leftover component while I'm
repairing the S.S. Dolphin.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6d3f1e670d034b289412bfed85415e17" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly" lipsync="0"/]I may be able to combine them with some
of the junk I have in storage to make
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]gear [System:Color name="Default"]and [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]items [System:Color name="Default"]to aid in my search!
HeroStoryUI.MessageType04_1:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="0143c313c31049348098327c925812d8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad" lipsync="0"/]I only have [System:Color name="Warning" ]2 days left[System:Color name="Default"] to complete my
search...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]and I'm still missing quite a few
ship parts.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0143c313c31049348098327c925812d8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command" lipsync="0"/]But I refuse to give up![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0143c313c31049348098327c925812d8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly" lipsync="0"/]I must've overlooked something or some
place.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Tomorrow I will keep a close eye on
the [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Radar Map[System:Color name="Default"] to find the missing parts.
HeroStoryUI.MessageType04_2:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="1281785953d24d159f0ca627b5c15200" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk" lipsync="0"/]I only have [System:Color name="Warning" ]2 days left[System:Color name="Default"] to complete my
search...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]but I'm happy to report that the
S.S. Dolphin repairs are almost complete![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1281785953d24d159f0ca627b5c15200" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly" lipsync="0"/]There's no time for laxness![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I need to stay
focused and keep my eye on the[System:Color name="Emphasis" ] Radar
Map [System:Color name="Default"]if I want to find the remaining parts.
HeroStoryUI.MessageType04_3:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="a1626288b73e4627878acb175321d6d6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad" lipsync="0"/]Only [System:Color name="Warning" ]3 days remain[System:Color name="Default"]...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] So far, my efforts to
collect the ship parts haven't gone so well.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a1626288b73e4627878acb175321d6d6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command" lipsync="0"/]But I won't let anything keep me from my
family![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I have to keep trying, no matter
how much time I have left.
HeroStoryUI.MessageType04_4:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="d290447c34d14279adc2bdf7c846b87c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk" lipsync="0"/]Only [System:Color name="Warning" ]3 days remain[System:Color name="Default"]...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]and my efforts to
collect all my ship parts are paying off![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d290447c34d14279adc2bdf7c846b87c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad" lipsync="0"/]If I can keep collecting the parts I need at
this rate,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'll be home soon enough!
HeroStoryUI.MessageType05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="09e46d304c754f51a01ad0282166e902" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad" lipsync="0"/]Excellent news![etc:Wait frame="8"/] The repairs made to the
S.S. Dolphin have made it possible to fly
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]to more distant areas[System:Color name="Default"].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="09e46d304c754f51a01ad0282166e902" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly" lipsync="0"/]As a result, my search radius has also
expanded quite a bit![etc:Wait frame="15"/] For now, I need to
go about this search [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]strategically[System:Color name="Default"]...
HeroStoryUI.MessageType06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="cd141ea81d5446c49041d13c7391d6ab" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad" lipsync="0"/]Huzzah![etc:Wait frame="8"/] The S.S. Dolphin's engine output
has increased, and it can fly even higher![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="cd141ea81d5446c49041d13c7391d6ab" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly" lipsync="0"/]Maybe tomorrow I'll extend my search to
a [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]new area[System:Color name="Default"]...
HeroStoryUI.MessageType07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="c9934e456e954202a490860e1cbf600f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad" lipsync="0"/]At long last, my goal of collecting all the
missing S.S. Dolphin parts is within reach.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c9934e456e954202a490860e1cbf600f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly" lipsync="0"/]According to the S.S. Dolphin's radar,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
the last pieces are [System:Color name="Warning" ]inside some kind of
giant structure[System:Color name="Default"]...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c9934e456e954202a490860e1cbf600f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk" lipsync="0"/]My life-support system is reaching its
limit.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] This is my last chance.
HeroStoryUI.MessageType08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="b0980ae975db41ca85b084b220c2091b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk" lipsync="0"/]Though I didn't collect a single ship part,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I need to remain patient.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] One must always
explore carefully and thoughtfully.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b0980ae975db41ca85b084b220c2091b" Scale="1"/]I should reference the [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Radar Map[System:Color name="Default"] while I
search to check for nearby parts.
HeroStoryUI.MessageType09_1:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="c67521f8a4cb426faddff53ef29b0fba" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think" lipsync="0"/]Today I put in a hard day's work.[etc:Wait frame="30"/]
I wonder how everyone at Hocotate
Freight is doing...
HeroStoryUI.MessageType09_2:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="e0b7b381baa1407b9e1966d0d5fbf46e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think" lipsync="0"/]Sometimes I find myself questioning
whether I'll ever be able to escape
this planet.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e0b7b381baa1407b9e1966d0d5fbf46e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly" lipsync="0"/]Then I remember my family is still waiting
for me back at home...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I would bear any
hardship to see them again.
HeroStoryUI.MessageType09_3:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="14dd9d78e0b34a4ea8262e9c0f920500" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk" lipsync="0"/]Pikmin combine the growth rate of plants
and the mobility of animals.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="14dd9d78e0b34a4ea8262e9c0f920500" Scale="1"/]As individuals they may appear weak,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
but when acting together,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] their species
is quite indomitable.
HeroStoryUI.MessageType09_4:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="449ebcc9865243e5859dba1b45ada9e4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk" lipsync="0"/]The creatures of this planet breathe a
deadly poisonous gas: oxygen.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] At present,
my space suit can filter the oxygen out.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="449ebcc9865243e5859dba1b45ada9e4" Scale="1"/]But if the batteries for my life-support
system should fail...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I shudder to even
think about it.
HeroStoryUI.MessageType09_5:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="9b75df808e294a25870fbaff983800ab" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk" lipsync="0"/]The repairs to my spaceship are
progressing, little by little.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9b75df808e294a25870fbaff983800ab" Scale="1"/]It's funny.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] This ship feels like an extension
of my own body...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Perhaps a clunky arm?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I need to fix it so we can escape together.
HeroStoryUI.MessageType09_6:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="dd34afe253694afca6df021b2e5f1a9f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think" lipsync="0"/]I wonder why the plants on this planet
are so large in size when compared to
the creatures.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="dd34afe253694afca6df021b2e5f1a9f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly" lipsync="0"/]Perhaps, in the far distant past,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] there
lived enormous creatures whose existence
is beyond the stretch of my imagination.
HeroStoryUI.MessageType09_7:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="27327f4102ee4e84baf4fadf31876d57" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think" lipsync="0"/]Perhaps the collision with the meteor that
led to my shipwreck was my fault.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Could I
have been more cautious?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Yet...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="27327f4102ee4e84baf4fadf31876d57" Scale="1"/]When the S.S. Dolphin crashed onto this
planet,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I felt another forceâ€”a force aside
from gravityâ€”was at work.
HeroStoryUI.MessageType09_8:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="8e10b6843bd048a493d3d4473809170d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk" lipsync="0"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Proper planning[System:Color name="Default"] is essential in both my
day job and in my search for missing
parts.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Tomorrow, the work continues.
HeroStoryUI.MessageType09_9:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="e1430de710e34c65933927305cab15db" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk" lipsync="0"/]If any of my tasks can be done tomorrow,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
then I won't be doing them tonight.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I promised myself a good night's sleep.
HeroStoryUI.MessageType09_10:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="4d8646f1acaa4f1bb6a0270cae8ea634" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk" lipsync="0"/]When things go wrong,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I must remember
that means I'll do it that much better the
next time.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Or, at least,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I hope I will.
HeroStoryUI.MessageType09_11:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="5286450fc4094789856080482b017dd3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk" lipsync="0"/]I just need to focus on the small wins I
achieve every day.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Add them all up, and
they should equal a successful escape.
HeroStoryUI.MessageType10:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="7eba7b67e6e3477c80ac1f04b179c69b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk" lipsync="0"/]This is [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="7eba7b67e6e3477c80ac1f04b179c69b" Scale="1"/]I'm currently stranded on an unknown
planet in the far reaches of space.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="7eba7b67e6e3477c80ac1f04b179c69b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command" lipsync="0"/]Please send help...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]as fast as you can![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="7eba7b67e6e3477c80ac1f04b179c69b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly" lipsync="0"/]...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="7eba7b67e6e3477c80ac1f04b179c69b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad" lipsync="0"/]I can only hope this distress signal
reaches the Rescue Corps...
